issue.title: Replace only `$stealth` exceptions with specific options

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

In https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt, there are many rules that completely disable Stealth Mode, although almost every time it requires to disable one or two options.

### Proposed solution

Recheck old rules with `$stealth` exceptions without specific options and add options where it is possible.

### Additional information

_No response_

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Hello,

There are already effective [filtering rules ](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/be7975c3353b62161fc4a3a9d12bfdd3feba2008)for the `deals.digidip.net` domain.

But I've noticed that there's now sometimes a variant: `dealabs2de.digidip.net`

Examples:
https://dealabs2de.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.fr%2Fdp%2FB07BCNJV9N%3Fsmid%3DA1X6FK5RDHNB96&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2F&ref=ppr-fr-1733286833

https://dealabs2de.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.fr%2Fdp%2FB0CYH5VPJC%3Fsmid%3DA1X6FK5RDHNB96&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2F&ref=ppr-fr-1733287761

https://dealabs2de.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.fr%2Fdp%2FB0CFL49C1J%3Fsmid%3DA1X6FK5RDHNB96&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2F&ref=ppr-fr-1744318189

Could you modify the current rules to include it? 

### Proposed solution

```
||*dealabs*.digidip.net/visit?url=$urltransform=/%3A/:/
||*dealabs*.digidip.net/visit?url=$urltransform=/%2F/\//
||*dealabs*.digidip.net/visit?url=$urltransform=/%3F/?/
||*dealabs*.digidip.net/visit?url=$urltransform=/%3D/=/
||*dealabs*.digidip.net/visit?url=$urltransform=/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?(?:dealabs|dealabs2de)\.digidip\.net.*url=([^&]*).*/\$1/
```

I'm not sure it is the best syntax, not being an expert in this field, but It works on all the urls I've tested. 

Thank you

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: Replace only `$stealth` exceptions with specific options

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

In https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt, there are many rules that completely disable Stealth Mode, although almost every time it requires to disable one or two options.

### Proposed solution

Recheck old rules with `$stealth` exceptions without specific options and add options where it is possible.

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body: @piquark6046 could you also please remove comments in square brackets like `[Stealth Mode - Referrer]`? Since it is now clear by the rule itself.
